actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The pirate makes three attacks, using Rapier or Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage, and the pirate has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range 30/90 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Captain’s Charm
bonus_actions.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature the pirate can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has the Charmed condition until the start of the pirate’s next turn.

reactions.name: Riposte
reactions.trigger: The pirate is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.
reactions.response: The pirate adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the pirate makes one Rapier attack against the triggering creature if within range.
